title: Software Development Engineer, WMO
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Build next-generation APIs and rendering frameworks for mobile apps.
- Own full stack development for iOS and/or Android.
- Collaborate with diverse engineering teams to enhance customer experiences.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 3+ years of professional software development experience.
- 2+ years in system design or architecture.
- Strong problem-solving skills and leadership qualities.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Mobile technologies, particularly React Native.
- Native development for iOS and Android.
- Experience with software programming languages.

title: Sr Machine Learning Engineer, Sponsored Products and Brands
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop and manage machine learning models and infrastructure.
- Create scalable real-time ML inference solutions.
- Identify and deliver operational improvements and resolve production issues.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 5+ years of professional software development experience.
- 5+ years of programming in at least one language.
- Experience leading design or architecture of systems.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Machine learning and natural language processing products.
- Causal inference and reinforcement learning techniques.
- Low-latency data transformation and engineering solutions.

title: Lab Engineer- Lab Operations, Project Kuiper
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Implement and maintain automated test systems and frameworks.
- Perform hardware/software integration and troubleshooting on the manufacturing floor.
- Configure and integrate test equipment with automation systems.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 2+ years of software QA testing experience.
- 1+ years in consumer electronics lab environments.
- Bachelor's degree in relevant engineering or computer science field.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- TestStand and LabVIEW for automated testing.
- Linux or Unix environments.
- Jenkins for build environments.

title: Software Dev. Engineer SDE II, Sponsored Products and Brands
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Design and develop scalable high-performance systems and services  
• Build services handling billions of requests daily  
• Maintain response latencies in milliseconds with strict SLAs  

REQUIREMENTS:
• 3+ years of professional software development experience  
• 2+ years of design or architecture experience  
• Experience with large-scale machine learning and AI solutions  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Machine Learning (ML)  
• Large Language Models (LLM)  
• Generative AI (GenAI)

title: Software Dev Engineer Intern - AI (Summer 2026), Amazon Devices & Services
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Collaborate with teams to design and build innovative products.
- Develop scalable solutions using cloud-native architectures.
- Participate in code reviews and maintain technical documentation.
- Write clean, maintainable code following best practices.
- Troubleshoot and resolve production issues.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Must be 18 years or older.
- Experience programming in Java, C++, or C#.
- Enrolled in a relevant Bachelor's degree program.
- Experience with AI/ML technologies preferred.
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Cloud-native architectures and microservices.
- AI and machine learning tools.
- Agile development practices and CI/CD principles.

title: Checkout Engineering Systems Engineer, GRAISE
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Lead technical design discussions for payment and POS systems.
- Implement critical components of payment and POS systems.
- Create design specifications for system integrations.
- Establish automated testing strategies and monitoring solutions.
- Develop automated alerting systems for payment flows.
- Collaborate with teams to meet business requirements.
- Resolve complex production issues and drive improvements.
- Author technical documentation and conduct retrospectives.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 4+ years in site reliability or systems engineering.
- 5+ years of Linux experience.
- Bachelor's degree in relevant field or equivalent experience.
- Experience in scripting languages like Python or Java.
- Knowledge of TCP/IP and networking protocols.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Linux operating systems.
- Payment and Point-of-Sale (POS) systems.
- Service-oriented architecture and web services.

criteria.name: Job function
criteria.value: Quality Assurance, Information Technology, and Engineering

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**

- Service-oriented architecture and web services.

title: SDE- ML Engineer, Frontier AI Robotics
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Build and optimize distributed training infrastructure for ML models.
- Collaborate with scientists and engineers on scalable systems.
- Implement parallelism techniques for efficient model training.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 3+ years of professional software development experience.
- 2+ years in system design and architecture.
- Strong understanding of LLM algorithms and deep learning frameworks.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Proficient in PyTorch, Python, and C++.
- Experience with GPU memory optimization techniques.
- Familiarity with machine learning infrastructure design.

title: Machine Learning Engineer II, Special Projects
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Collaborate with scientists and engineers to launch AI solutions.  
• Write high-quality, maintainable code following best practices.  
• Own end-to-end deployment of ML models at scale.  
• Build and optimize automated data processing workflows.  
• Contribute to architecture decisions and technical strategy.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• 2+ years of professional software development experience.  
• 2+ years of design or architecture experience.  
• Proficient in at least one programming language.  
• Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Machine Learning models and frameworks.  
• Software development tools and practices.  
• Automated data processing workflows.

title: Software Development Engineer- Simulation, Frontier AI Robotics
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop simulations for reinforcement learning and synthetic data generation.
- Implement robotics features like sensor and actuator modeling.
- Create asset toolchains supporting industry-standard formats.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 5+ years of professional software development experience.
- Extensive experience in physics simulation and rigid body simulation.
- Proficiency in Python and C++ programming languages.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Experience with Isaac Sim, Unity, or Unreal Engine.
- Familiarity with 3D formats: URDF, MJCF, USD.
- Understanding of modern ML frameworks like PyTorch.

**RESPONSIBILITIES:**

**REQUIREMENTS:**

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**

- Familiarity with 3D formats: URDF, MJCF, USD.
- Understanding of modern ML frameworks like PyTorch.

title: SDE- ML Engineer, Frontier AI Robotics
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Build and optimize distributed training infrastructure for ML models.  
• Collaborate with scientists and engineers on scalable systems.  
• Monitor and optimize GPU memory and throughput for training.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• 3+ years of software development experience.  
• 2+ years in system design and architecture.  
• Strong understanding of LLM algorithms and deep learning frameworks.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Proficient in PyTorch, Python, and C++.  
• Experience with parallelism techniques in ML.  
• Knowledge of linear algebra, calculus, and statistics.
